Title: Episode 1
Plot: Luther returns to work after a traumatic arrest to investigate the murder of a former child genius's parents, and quickly deduces that their daughter is responsible. However, unable to find evidence to convict, he becomes embroiled in a battle of wits with the suspect - who has set her sights on him and his estranged wife.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Paul McGann, Ruth Wilson, Saskia Reeves
